title: Boris Logo Font ID ... Please help!
content:
Hi Friends,

Can anyone identify the typeface used for the F and B in the circle part of this logo?

I really like the curves, but am having a tough time identifying.

Many thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100212205110/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_54.gif) | 3.82 KB |
author: bjk

comments.content:
Yves, bjk is looking for the letters of the ‘fB’ monogram.

I’m pretty sure this is custom. Some things just can't be typed.

Hi Florian - yes, you are correct. I'm trying to identify the monogram part of the logo.

Thank you Yves for the reply tho.
